property.name: flink_user
property.description: 使用该用户运行Flink的守护进程

property.name: content
property.value:
# set JAVA_HOME env.java.home: /usr/lib/jvm/java-1.8.0-openjdk-1.8.0.65-3.b17.el7.x86_64/jre env.java.opts: -XX:+UseG1GC env.java.opts.jobmanager: env.java.opts.taskmanager:
# set historyserver port historyserver.web.port: 12000 historyserver.archive.fs.dir: hdfs:///user/flink/applicationHistory historyserver.archive.fs.refresh-interval: 10000
historyserver.cli.fallback: true jobmanager.archive.fs.dir: hdfs:///user/flink/applicationHistory jobmanager.heap.size: 1073741824
rest.port: 8081
# Flink high-availability # high-availability.zookeeper.quorum: localhost:2181 # high-availability: ZOOKEEPER # high-availability.storageDir: hdfs:///user/flink/ha # high-availability.zookeeper.client.acl: open
execution.buffer-timeout: 100 execution.checkpointing.externalized-checkpoint-retention: RETAIN_ON_CANCELLATION execution.checkpointing.max-concurrent-checkpoints: 1 execution.checkpointing.min-pause: 0 execution.checkpointing.mode: EXACTLY_ONCE execution.checkpointing.snapshot-compression: false execution.checkpointing.timeout: 60000 execution.target: yarn-per-job
parallelism.default: 1 pipeline.auto-watermark-interval: 200 pipeline.generic-types: true pipeline.object-reuse: false
security.kerberos.login.contexts: Client,KafkaClient security.kerberos.login.use-ticket-cache: false
state.backend: FILESYSTEM state.backend.incremental: true state.backend.local-recovery: true state.backend.rocksdb.memory.high-prio-pool-ratio: 0.1 state.backend.rocksdb.memory.managed: true state.backend.rocksdb.memory.write-buffer-ratio: 0.5 state.backend.rocksdb.timer-service.factory: ROCKSDB state.checkpoints.dir: hdfs:///user/flink/checkpoints state.checkpoints.num-retained: 3 state.savepoints.dir: hdfs:///user/flink/savepoints table.exec.hive.infer-source-parallelism: true table.exec.hive.infer-source-parallelism.max: 1000
taskmanager.memory.fraction: 0.6 taskmanager.memory.managed.fraction: 0.4 taskmanager.memory.network.fraction: 0.1 taskmanager.memory.network.max: 2147483648 taskmanager.memory.process.size: 2147483648 taskmanager.numberOfTaskSlots: 1
yarn.application-attempts: 5 yarn.container-start-command-template: %java% %jvmmem% %jvmopts% -DyarnContainerId=$CONTAINER_ID %logging% %class% %args% %redirects% yarn.maximum-failed-containers: 100 yarn.tags: flink
classloader.check-leaked-classloader: false
